verbs.description: President Donald Trump and North Korean President Kim Jong Un [V: are] expected to meet one - on - one on Sentosa Island .
President Donald Trump and North Korean President Kim Jong Un are [V: expected] [ARG1: to meet one - on - one on Sentosa Island] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump and North Korean President Kim Jong Un] are expected to [V: meet] [ARG1: one - on - one] [ARGM-LOC: on Sentosa Island] .
